entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 9:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -32

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
